title: LIFE STORIES THAT WE ADMIRE
name: Tiếng Anh 12 - Unit 1: LIFE STORIES THAT WE ADMIRE

words.example: Her humble upbringing shaped the admirable life story we cherish.
Her grandparents decided to bring her up against all odds.
The well-brought-up leader treated everyone with grace in her memoir.
Winning the scholarship was a milestone in his inspiring life story.

1995 was a milestone year that changed his destiny.
The peace prize became the milestone event of her narrative.
His rise from adversity inspired millions.
She succeeded despite adverse conditions.
The war years adversely affected his education, yet he persevered.

The final triumph crowned her years of sacrifice.

words.meaning: việc lo toan kiểu người lớn
words.example: Her memoir makes adulting feel purposeful, not tedious.
In hindsight, every failure was a disguised milestone.
In hindsight, the rejection letter redirected her destiny.
His biography warns readers of hindsight bias when judging choices.
Her ambition was never about fame but meaningful impact.
The ambitious project rebuilt an entire village.
They ambitiously set out to educate one million girls.
His ambitiousness frightened skeptics yet inspired followers.
Determination echoed through each chapter of her memoir.
She determined never to let poverty dictate her future.
A determined spirit carried him past every obstacle.
He worked determinedly to fund the orphanage.
It takes courage to narrate one's darkest moments.
Her courageous stance saved countless lives.
He courageously challenged an unjust system.
Her letters encourage readers to pursue purpose.
His journey from exile to leader inspires millions.
Their intertwined journeys reveal universal truths.
She found healing while journeying across deserts.
The odyssey tested every ounce of her resilience.
Their separate odysseys converge in a shared epiphany.
An Odyssean voyage defined the protagonist's character arc.
Each achievement seemed impossible until it was done.
She achieved her dream of eradicating illiteracy locally.
The goals felt barely achievable, yet they persevered.
Every achiever in the book credits teamwork.
Building the clinic was her proudest accomplishment.
Together they accomplished what seemed unthinkable.
An accomplished pianist, he donates concerts for charity.
The struggle for equality anchors the narrative.
A struggling student later founded a tech empire.
Their struggles resonate with readers worldwide.
Personal growth follows every painful lesson.
They vowed to grow wiser, not bitter.
A growing optimism fuels her community work.
As a grown-up, he mentors orphans he once lived with.
Slow progress eventually reshaped the nation.
The clear progression of ideals keeps readers engaged.
Her progressive reforms faced fierce opposition.
Life improved progressively as education spread.
The memory of hardship fuels his generosity.
She would memorize poems to escape adversity.
Their first victory was a memorable turning point.
A memorial now honors those who sacrificed.
Fame arrived, but humility never left her.
The famous scientist credits a rural teacher.
He famously donated his prize money to charity.
A famed actress quietly funds scholarships.
Humility endears the protagonist to every reader.
Success never stopped her from staying humble.
He humbly admits learning from his students.
The award ceremony was a humbling experience.
Generosity became her trademark legacy.
A generous donor funded the library.
They generously shared credit with the team.
Compassion guided every policy she drafted.
A compassionate doctor treated patients for free.
He spoke compassionately about mental health.
Empathy bridges gaps between diverse characters.
Readers empathize with her relentless sacrifices.
His empathetic leadership nurtured innovation.
She listens empathetically before offering advice.
Embracing vulnerability made his speeches powerful.
A vulnerable confession transformed public perception.
None of us are invulnerable to failure, he notes.
A solo trek sparked her self-discovery.
He set off to self-discover through art.
The self-discovered purpose reshaped his life.
She struggled with identity in a new country.

Her writing style is instantly identifiable.
His rural background shaped his humility.
The author backgrounds each chapter with history.
A concise backgrounder precedes the interview.
She traced her ancestry to resilient farmers.
An ancestor's diary inspired the modern quest.
An ancestral home became a community school.
His royal lineage never dulled his empathy.
She is the lineal descendant of a poet-warrior.
The title passed lineally for centuries.
The descendant revived a forgotten craft.
He descends from humble fishermen.
Her descent into despair was short-lived thanks to friends.
Positive mentors boosted her self-esteem.
He is esteemed for uniting communities.
An esteemed elder narrates the preface.
The transition from soldier to peace-builder defines him.
Transitional periods often breed creativity.
She shares tips on healthy transitioning.
A profound metamorphosis followed his epiphany.
She metamorphosed grief into art.
Their metamorphic journey fascinates readers.
Teaching became his true vocation.
Vocational training lifted the village from poverty.
She is vocationally focused on sustainable farming.
Their quest for justice spans continents.
Each quester discovers a unique truth.
A questing spirit radiates from her prose.
Passion fuels the protagonist's philanthropy.
She is passionate about inclusive education.
He speaks passionately against injustice.
An impassioned plea closes the memoir.
The pursuit of knowledge defines her legacy.
They pursue dreams others deem impossible.
Every pursuer of truth faces sacrifice.
Pursuing equality, she drafted bold legislation.
Each obstacle refined her character.
Nay-sayers tried to obstruct the reform.
Legal obstruction delayed the school's opening.
An obstructive mindset stifles creativity.
The biggest challenge was convincing investors.
A challenging climb symbolised inner battles.
The young challenger eventually became mentor.
Tenacity turns stumbling blocks into steps.
Her tenacious advocacy changed the law.
He tenaciously pursued every lead.
Age brought him wisdom and calm authority.
A wise mentor redirected her anger.
She wisely invested in education programs.
Finding belonging healed his childhood wounds.
They finally felt they belong in the new land.
She packed few belongings yet carried rich memories.
The trajectory of his career defied statistics.
Their trajectories intersected at a refugee camp.
A trajectorial shift occurs after her awakening.
Purpose replaced profit as his main driver.
She walks with a purposeful stride toward change.
He purposely simplified science for children.
A purposeless year abroad eventually sparked innovation.
Honest introspection helped the heroine rewrite her narrative.
His introspective journals later inspired millions.
She paused to introspect before each pivotal choice.
The leader spoke introspectively about past missteps.
Writing the memoir became catharsis after tragedy.
Her cathartic speech drew tears and applause.
He laughed cathartically at the memory of failure.
The epilogue reveals her quiet life of service.

The choir sang transcendentally at the memorial.
A meeting born of serendipity changed history.
Their serendipitous detour led to a pivotal discovery.
Funds arrived serendipitously when hope was fading.
Education unlocked her self-actualization.
He helped students self-actualize through science.
A self-actualized artist mentors new voices.
Her memoir wrestles with existential questions.
His quiet existence hid remarkable courage.
They exist between cultures yet feel at home.
She spoke existentially about purpose after loss.
Reconciliation healed decades of family silence.
They reconciled before the final chapter closed.

Their dreams proved reconcilable after dialogue.

Authenticity made her story timeless.

She speaks authentically about pain and hope.
The inevitability of change drove his urgency.
Failure was inevitable before mastery.

Mindfulness kept her grounded amid fame.

In the foreseeable future, her charity will expand.
Emancipation from fear defined her adulthood.

Their work has an emancipatory impact on youth.
He rejected retribution, choosing forgiveness.

They refused to act retributively after victory.
The award was the culmination of decades of toil.

Moral ascendancy outweighed political power.
She ascended from clerk to CEO with integrity.
Her ideas are ascendant in modern education.
Deep rumination preceded his breakthrough.
They ruminated on past mistakes together.

She speaks ruminatively about loss and renewal.
A day of commemoration honors fallen mentors.

A commemorative plaque bears her name.
Their shared tribulation forged unbreakable bonds.
Few could tribulate so long and still smile.
A tribulatory road led to triumph.
She shifted the paradigm of rural healthcare.
His life is paradigmatic of humble leadership.
They paradigmatically re-imagined charity work.
The ephemerality of fame never swayed her purpose.
Ephemeral trends could not distract him.
Glory flashed ephemerally before settling into legacy.
The memoir explores the dichotomy of public and private self.
Her dichotomous emotions drive the plot.
He viewed wealth and happiness dichotomously at first.
The author refuses to dichotomize success and failure.
Survivorship colored every chapter of his life.
Survival instincts honed his leadership.
She survived illness to share her wisdom.
Each survivor testified to collective fortitude.
Marathon training mirrored his endurance in life.
Families endure separation during migration.
Her enduring optimism attracted allies.
The story remains enduringly relevant.
He stood at the precipice of despair, then leapt to hope.
Their precipitous fall in fortune taught humility.

From his new vantage, he empowered others.
The memoir offers a rare vantage-point on war relief.
Their home became a nexus for young innovators.
The book maps cultural nexuses across continents.

Growth exists on a continuum, not in leaps.

He continually adapted to new challenges.
She wrote diaries for posterity's guidance.
Posterior chapters reveal hidden mentors.
The lesson becomes clear posteriorly in the tale.
The author balances sentimentality with realism.
A sentimental locket anchors her memories.
He refuses to sentimentalize poverty.
She spoke sentimentally about her late mentor.
Stoicism helped him endure unjust exile.
A stoic calm marked her courtroom victories.
He remained stoical despite media storms.
